name: T-Vision Musician
description: T-Vision Musician is a game about a famous musician who was diagnosed with tunnel vision in an unfortunate accident at one performance. You play the role of getting to the stage and performing without getting hurt anymore then you already are! Made in a couple days for Brackey's 2nd game jam with the theme "Love is Blind" I took the approach of physically blind, as a result of too much love! XD These are the first cut scenes I have ever made in a game, so go easy, but I hope you enjoy the silliness anyways! :D (Also everything was made in less than a week including models, animations, music, sound effects, audio, UI, and so on.) WARNING: Game is playable online, but not very well, lots of photographers running around with AI, slows down significantly on the third level, the download preforms much better.
